body:
Select  Distinct USADHKT.FirmaId, USADHKT.FirmaKodu, USADHKT.FirmaAdi, 'SATIŞ SİPARİŞ' Tur, USD.UTSiparisDurumAdi Durum
From    IT04_UTSiparisM USM 
INNER JOIN IT01_Firmalar USADHKT On USADHKT.FirmaID = USM.FirmaID
INNER JOIN IT01_UTSiparisDurumlari USD On USD.UTSiparisDurumID = USM.UTSiparisDurumID
Where   USM.UTSiparisDurumID <> 990
Union
--Select  Distinct SAHKSI.FirmaId, SAHKSI.FirmaKodu,  SAHKSI.FirmaAdi, 'HK AMBAR' Tur From PV06_StokAmbarHamKumas_SeriID SAHKSI
--Union 
Select Distinct SAO.firmaID, SAO.FirmaKodu, SAO.FirmaAdi, 'SATIN ALMA SİPARİŞ' Tur, SD.SiparisDurumAdi Durum From IT12_SiparisM SM
INNER JOIN IT01_Firmalar SAO On SAO.FirmaID = SM.FirmaID
INNER JOIN IT12_SiparisDurumlari SD On SD.SiparisDurumID = SM.DurumID
Where SM.DurumID = 0
Order By Tur, USADHKT.FirmaAdi
Go
